name: Real bird: Tap to fly!
description:
The most photorealistic bird game inspired by the most simple, addictive and hard gameplay of all the times

- Awesome photorealistic retina graphics. Just like watching a video!
- Easy controls: Tap to fly!
- Universal: iPod touch, iPhone and iPad.
- Game center integration.
- Free without iAP.
- Addiction and frantic difficulty.
